headline: Ingersoll Rand to Participate in Upcoming Investor Conferences
summary: DAVIDSON, N.C., Jan. 27, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Ingersoll Rand Inc. (NYSE: IR), a global provider of mission-critical flow creation and life science and industrial solutions, announced that Vik Kini, chief financial officer, will participate in fireside chats at the following upcoming investor conferences: The Barclays Industrial Select Conference on Wednesday, February 18, 2026, at 9:50 a.m. Eastern Time. The Citi Global Industrial Tech and Mobility Conference on Thursday, February 19, 2026,
